Cya in a few weeks, Prodigey. Good luck with the arm.

::Depth Charge/Prowl::

Depth Charge steps back at Iron Raptor's order, glaring at Megaton. 
He would love nothing more than to rip this Predacon to shreds.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl nods, taking out a mini holoprojector which projects a 
blueprint of his idea for the Maximal City.

"Here's what I think," he says. "We take the Cybertronian Fire and 
your ship, and build it into a city that is controlled by that new 
ship," he points to the Element, which was standing in perfect 
condition near the Cybertronian Fire. "We'll need to get that ship's 
captain's permission first though. If we use the full capacities of 
all the ships, this city should be impenetrable."
